mapper.select: SELECT sr.mapping, sr.method FROM sys_resource sr LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr ON srr.resource_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srr.role_id WHERE sur.uid = #{uid} AND sr.auth_type = 3

SELECT sr.mapping, sr.method FROM sys_resource sr LEFT JOIN sys_menu_resource smr ON smr.resource_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON smr.menu_id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srm.role_id WHERE sur.uid = 1
